iDeals is a global B2B SaaS product company recognized as the most highly rated and customer-centric in a secure business collaboration market. As a passionate professional, in this role, you will work cross-functionally with the Revenue Operations, Finance, Accounting, Billing, and Internal IT team to maintain solid customer relationships by handling questions and requests with speed and professionalism. You will report to a Head of Billing & Accounts Receivable.

Location: remote from any city in Poland
